sense.gloss: to line up, to put in a row
to add (to a group), to accept (as a member of an organization, etc.), to join (e.g. a list)
x: 名を連ねる・なをつらねる
袂を連ねる・たもとをつらねる

sense.gloss: to link, to put together, to string together (e.g. compliments), to enumerate
x: 美辞麗句を連ねる・びじれいくをつらねる
書き連ねる・かきつらねる

sense.gloss: to take along with, to bring with
